trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> event is raised for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that is visible on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> é gerado para cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> que é visível em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, set the properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs> to change the appearance of the cell instead of directly accessing a cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Para melhorar o desempenho, defina as propriedades um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs> para alterar a aparência da célula, em vez de acessar diretamente em uma célula a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the cell, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se você manualmente pintar a célula, defina o <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: If you do not set <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `true`, the cell will paint over your customizations.
trans-unit.target: Se você não definir <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para `true`, a célula será pintar suas personalizações.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Como personalizar a aparência de células no controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that contains the cell to be painted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que contém a célula a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that contains the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que contém os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> que está sendo pintado.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de linha da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna da célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates" /> que especifica o estado da célula.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> que está sendo pintado.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Os dados formatados do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> que está sendo pintado.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Uma mensagem de erro associada à célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> que contém informações de formatação e estilo sobre a célula.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> que contém estilos de borda para a célula que está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> que especificam as partes a serem pintadas.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="dataGridView" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridView" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="graphics" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="graphics" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="cellStyle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="cellStyle" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="paintParts" /> is not a valid bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="paintParts" /> não é uma combinação bit a bit válida de valores de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de borda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> that represents the border style of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle" /> que representa o estilo de borda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Change the borders of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.AdvancedBorderStyle%2A> property to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: Alterar as bordas do atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> , definindo as propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.AdvancedBorderStyle%2A> propriedade para um do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> valores.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obter os limites da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Como personalizar a aparência de células no controle DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de célula do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> that contains the cell style of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle" /> que contém o estilo de célula do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: Change the appearance of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Alterar a aparência do atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> , definindo as propriedades do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> propriedade representa a área do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> que precisa ser pintada novamente.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window, and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se um usuário abrange todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> com outra janela e, em seguida, em seguida, descobre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> representa todo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and then uncovers it, then <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Se um usuário aborda uma área pequena do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>e, em seguida, em seguida, descobre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ClipBounds%2A> representa a área de pequena foi coberta.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da coluna do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property returns -1 when a row header cell is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> propriedade retorna -1 quando uma célula de cabeçalho de linha está sendo pintada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que representa uma mensagem de erro para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa uma mensagem de erro atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: When the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is a row header cell, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: Quando atual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> é uma célula de cabeçalho de linha, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> propriedade é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.

trans-unit.source: When the current cell is a data cell, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: Quando a célula atual for uma célula de dados, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.

trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted value of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor formatado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor formatado do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A> property contains the value of the cell after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has been applied to it, and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event has been handled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.FormattedValue%2A> propriedade contém o valor da célula após o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> propriedade foi aplicada a ele e depois o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> evento foi tratado.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para pintar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to paint the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usados para pintar atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> que especificam as partes a serem pintadas.

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the cell for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Pinta as partes da célula especificadas para a área nos limites indicados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que -1 ou maior ou igual ao número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que -1 ou maior ou igual ao número de colunas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> to paint the background of the specified bounds with the color of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para pintar a tela de fundo dos limites especificados com a cor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.SelectionBackColor" /> do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle" />; <see langword="false" /> para pintar a tela de fundo dos limites especificados com a cor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.BackColor" /> do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell background for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Pinta a tela de fundo da célula da área nos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que -1 ou maior ou igual ao número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que -1 ou maior ou igual ao número de colunas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that specifies the area of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que especifica a área do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> a ser pintada.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell content for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o conteúdo da célula para a área nos limites especificados.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex" /> é menor que -1 ou maior ou igual ao número de linhas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex" /> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex" /> é menor que -1 ou maior ou igual ao número de colunas no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.

trans-unit.source: The cell parts that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: As partes da célula que devem ser pintadas.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> values specifying the parts to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Uma combinação bit a bit de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts" /> valores que especificam as partes a serem pintadas.

trans-unit.target: O índice da linha do atual <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property returns -1 when a column header is being painted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> propriedade retorna -1 quando um cabeçalho de coluna está sendo pintado.
